title: Technology-Enhanced Language Learning Program for Higher-Order Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Activity design optimized for smartphone-centric learning environments, integrating offline sessions with mobile applications

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the logical structure and context of texts through linguistic analysis in technology-enhanced environments
Learners apply critical thinking through in-depth discussions with peers using digital collaboration tools
Learners integrate creative problem-solving strategies into language expression through project-based assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
